accordion.name: accordion
accordion.description: This is an accordion block. An accordion is a UI element that expands to reveal hidden content when clicked on.

accordionCollection.description: This is a collection of accordion items. Each item consists of a header and a body.

header.description: This is the header of the accordion item. It is usually a brief summary or a title representing the content of the item. When clicked, it triggers the expansion or collapse of the body.

content.description: This is the body of the accordion item. It contains the main content that is revealed when the header is clicked. It can contain text, links, images, etc.
